title: sharavaNabhava guruguham
sahitya:
sharavaNabhava guruguham SaNmukham bhajEham shrI


anupallavi

 varadAbhayakaram shaktyAyudha dharakaram puruhUtAdi sEvitam bhAgavatAdi sannutam


caraNam   pArvatI kumAram nava nandanAdiyuta dhIram nAdAnta vihAram nata bhaktajana mandAram
garvita shUrAdi haram gaNapati sOdaram varam vallI dEvasEnAnandakaram caturataram
